topic.title: MBC Omar Series Episode 25 - English
topic.body: A lavish suspense filled drama, set in a long gone era, that tells the stories of Omar ibn al-Khattab and those around him. In this episode the Muslims find a tricky foe in the Persians, and Omar addresses poverty in the community.

topic.title: MBC Omar Series Episode 24 - English
topic.body: A lavish suspense filled drama, set in a long gone era, that tells the stories of Omar ibn al-Khattab and those around him. In this episode, the beginning of Islam in Syria. Omar deals with cheating traders and obesity.

topic.title: MBC Omar Series Episode 26 - English subtitles
topic.body: A lavish suspense filled drama, set in a long gone era, that tells the stories of Omar ibn al-Khattab and those around him. In this episode, Omar mediates between disputes and Persia organises around a new leader.

topic.title: Samson & Delilah (1949) - [1/13]
topic.body: Again the Israelites did evil in the eyes of the Lord, so the Lord delivered them into the hands of the Philistines for forty years...

topic.title: Samson and Delilah (2009)
topic.body: Samson and Delilah's world is small- an isolated community in the Central Australian desert. When tragedy strikes they turn their backs on home and embark on a journey of survival. Lost, unwanted and alone they discover that life isn't always fair, but love never judges. - Written by Beck Cole

topic.title: MBC Omar Series Episode 27 - English subtitles
topic.body: A lavish suspense filled drama, set in a long gone era, that tells the stories of Omar ibn al-Khattab and those around him. In this episode Rustom engages in battle for the Persians and Omar mediates between the people in Medina.

topic.body: 一条蜿蜒的乡路上。。。此端忽略三百辞

topic.title: They killed him not, nor crucified him, but the resemblance of Jesus was put over another man
topic.body: "They killed him not, nor crucified him, but the resemblance of Jesus was put over another man, and those who differ therein are full of doubts." (An-Nisa 4:157)

5_114DPuy8FMBFTX7zSd4v54iKkRG6qVVx7P.body: Bother. The original magnet link was taken from Play on Zeronet and downloaded to WebTorrent which works fine when played in app. But, once WebTorrent's magnet link is downloaded here on KopyKate only the first (and shortest) MP4 file plays even though it downloads the whole 1.31GB. I was trying to get the same number of peers on Play to show on KopyKate. Did not happen. But file seems to download much quicker: this may just be perception or luck. No criticism of KopyKate intended. Thank you for your good work.
